titleStmt.title: The Psalmes of King David: translated by King Iames
Bible. O.T. Psalms. English. Alexander.
titleStmt.author: Stirling, William Alexander, Earl of, 1567 or 8-1640.
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

notesStmt.note: In fact mainly translated by William Alexander, Earl of Stirling.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
